title: Strictly's David James plays down 'chemistry' with Nadiya: 'It's not Love Island
text:
David has no time for romance while learning his dances on Strictly (Picture: BBC)

David James has praised his chemistry with Strictly pro partner Nadiya Bychkova but rubbished any thoughts of a romance as ‘it’s not Love Island’.

The 49-year-old surprised audiences on Saturday’s show with his stellar quickstep to From Now On from The Greatest Showman – earning his highest score to date after falling to the bottom of the leaderboard for three weeks in a row.

With his bond with Nadiya comes across on screen, the ex-footballer said that he’s happy people are seeing their connection – but it doesn’t mean the ‘Strictly curse’ will be coming into effect at all.

Speaking to Press Association, he said: ‘Logically, and this applies to anyone I’m sure, when you’re spending so much time with each other the chemistry is important, but obviously the goal for the two of us – Nadiya wants to win this competition as much as I do – we want to get better and better each week and be entertaining at the same time.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I think the situation with Nadiya and myself… there’s a goal in this,’ James continued. ‘Nadiya is a fantastic teacher, I want to be a fantastic student, but we’re on Strictly Come Dancing, not Love Island or some other show where people get themselves together.’

‘I think the chemistry between the two of us is perfect because we know what we’re here for,’ he added. ‘We’re enjoying the process, even though being in the dance-off isn’t fun.’

James has managed to knock out two of his competitors in the show after falling into the dance off two weeks running.

James Cracknell was the first to be eliminated from the series, followed by Anneka Rice during Movie Week in week three.

There were no eliminations in the first week of the series.

More: Strictly Come Dancing What were the Strictly Come Dancing leaderboard results from last night? Is Karim Zeroual in a relationship, after CBBC presenter scores high on Strictly? Stacey Dooley celebrates 'king' Kevin Clifton's birthday with sweet Instagram post

Nadiya, 30, is in a relationship with Slovenian footballer Matija Skarabot, while James is reported to be currently single.

Strictly Come Dancing continues Saturday at 6.40pm on BBC One.

description: David James and Nadiya Bychkova's bond on Strictly Come Dancing is clear for viewer to see, but the footballer says show 'isn't love island'
